results.title: Classroom Australia
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the Ansett Educational Travel Service. Shows children of all ages in the classroom and, also enjoying ground and air travel at Ayers Rock and other tourist attractions.

results.title: First days of life
results.creator_credit: Claude Edelmann, Boulton-Hawker Films and Les Films du Levant
results.brief_description: Shows the sequence of a natural childbirth, reviews all facets of the developing foetus and depicts some aspects of the development of the child to the age of three. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.

results.title: Buns
results.creator_credit: Thomas Bammel, Depicture Company and Oxford Films (U.S.)
results.brief_description: Shows a large factory complete with automation and assembly line, producing hamburger buns. Covers each detail of this production from the giant kneader handling hundreds of pounds of dough to the automatic packaging and shipping. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.

results.title: Over by Christmas, 1914
results.brief_description: Part of the Time to remember series. Deals with the year 1914 in Western Europe and the outbreak of hostilities in World War I. Includes images of Prince Albert, King George, King Wilheim, Queen Mary, Nicholas (Czar of Russia), the President of France and archival footage.

results.title: Rice growing in New South Wales
results.creator_credit: New South Wales. Dept. of Education
results.brief_description: Introduces briefly the essential soil and rainfall requirements for rice growing in NSW. Shows the steps taken by the farmer to grow the rice, including fertilization, sowing, irrigation and harvesting of the crop.

results.title: Wages and production
results.creator_credit: Arla Sorkin, Ilene Kahn, Terry Kahn Organization and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description:
Applies demand and supply principles to labour. Shows how wage rates affect the kinds and amounts of labour services offered and the amount demanded. Presents some factors affecting wage rates.
Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: The Fad diet circus
results.brief_description: Shows the potential hazards of fad diets, which seldom result in long-term weight loss. Compares two groups of dieters, one on a well balanced diet and the other on a low carbohydrate diet. Shows how both groups lose weight but the low carbohydrate group experiences medical problems.
